artist: Artist: Till Verclas; Publisher: Un Anno Un Libro; Book Binder: Christian Zwang
description: aluminum slipcase containing bound book with embossed soft cover; beige plain cover with pale blue abstract sketch across upper portion of cover; contents of book contain loosely sketched letterpress prints placed between simple white pages of paper, seventeen images total including title page; bound volume; lender's archive # 039
markings: Numbered in pencil on colophon page: I/III
medium: Polymer plate prints, letterpress; bound volume
provenance: William P. Kosmas, London, England (d. 2017); Estate of William P. Kosmas, Minneapolis; given to MIA, 2018.
signed: Signed in pencil on colophon page: Till Verclas
title: Der Aufstieg (The Ascent)
